data.name: Spider-Man (Miles)
data.description: Miles Morales controls the field with web blasts and electrical shocks that prolong negative effects and apply Disrupted.

starItems.name: Spider-Man (Miles)
starItems.description: Miles Morales controls the field with web blasts and electrical shocks that prolong negative effects and apply Disrupted.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage. If Squirrel Girl or any <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> is an ally or if the target has <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage. If Squirrel Girl or any <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> is an ally or if the target has <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage. If Squirrel Girl or any <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> is an ally or if the target has <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
If Squirrel Girl or any <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> is an ally or if the target has <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage. If Squirrel Girl or any <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> is an ally or if the target has <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage. If Squirrel Girl or any <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> is an ally or if the target has <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
If Squirrel Girl or any <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> is an ally or if the target has <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage. If Squirrel Girl or any <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> is an ally or if the target has <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects.

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage. If Squirrel Girl or any <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> is an ally or if the target has <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>. Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>. Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Reduce Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>35%</color>. Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>35%</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>. Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Reduce Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>15%</color>

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>. Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Prolong all negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> + prolong all negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color>. Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + prolong all negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color>. Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target.
Gain <color=#86e619>+100,000</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be blocked.

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target.
Gain <color=#86e619>+100,000</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> additional target

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target. Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> additional target.
Gain <color=#86e619>+100,000</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be blocked.

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target. Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> additional target.
Gain <color=#86e619>+100,000</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be blocked.

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target. Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> additional target.
Gain <color=#86e619>+100,000</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> additional target.
Gain <color=#86e619>+100,000</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional targets

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional targets.
Gain <color=#86e619>+100,000</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Dodge Chance.
1.nextUpgrade:
During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Dodge Chance
On Turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to a random target

2.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
On Turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to a random target. This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Dodge Chance.
2.nextUpgrade: On turn, always apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to a random target

3.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to a random target. This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Dodge Chance.
3.nextUpgrade:
During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Dodge Chance
On self or <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> ally dodge, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to that character

4.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to a random target. This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

On self or <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> ally dodge, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to that character.

During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Dodge Chance.
4.nextUpgrade: On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to a random target. If that target already had <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> instead

5.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to a random target. If that target already had <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> instead. This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

On self or <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> ally dodge, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to that character.

During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Dodge Chance.
